name: Tofu Soup With Scallions and Sprouts
keywords: coriander, firm tofu, mung bean sprouts, low-fat, main course

recipeInstructions.text: Heat the chicken broth and warm four soup bowls. In a large mixing bowl, combine the bean sprouts, chili oil, scallions, coriander, mint and basil and toss well to combine. Set aside for 10 minutes.

Place 1 cup rice in each of the 4 warm bowls. Divide the sprout mixture evenly over the rice, top with tofu cubes. Add the lemon juice to the hot chicken broth and ladle into each bowl and serve immediately.
